member.name: M:Brevitee.OAuth.OAuthController.SetTarget(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the controller and action to direct to after authentication

member.name: M:Brevitee.OAuth.OAuthController.GetUrl(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the full application url for the specified controller actoin

member.name: P:Brevitee.OAuth.OAuthResult.Scope
member.summary: The pemissions to request.

member.name: P:Brevitee.OAuth.OAuthResult.ClientId
member.summary: The ClientId for the application assigned by the OAuth provider.

member.name: P:Brevitee.OAuth.OAuthResult.RedirectUri
member.summary: The uri that the OAuth provider will redirect to in the current app after the user logs in/authorizes the app.

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.PublishStream
member.summary: Enables your application to post content; comments; and likes to a user's stream and to the streams of the user's friends. With this permission; you can publish content to a user's feed at any time; without requiring offline_access. However; please note that Facebook recommends a user-initiated sharing model.

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.CreateEvent
member.summary: Enables your application to create and modify events on the user's behalf

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.RsvpEvent
member.summary: Enables your application to RSVP to events on the user's behalf

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.Sms
member.summary: Enables your application to send messages to the user and respond to messages from the user via text message

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.OfflineAccess
member.summary: Enables your application to perform authorized requests on behalf of the user at any time. By default; most access tokens expire after a short time period to ensure applications only make requests on behalf of the user when the are actively using the application. This permission makes the access token returned by our OAuth endpoint long-lived.

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.PublishCheckins
member.summary: Enables your application to perform checkins on behalf of the user

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserAboutMe
member.summary: Provides access to the "About Me" section of the profile in the about property

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserActivities
member.summary: Provides access to the user's list of activities as the activities connection

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserBirthday
member.summary: Provides access to the birthday with year as the birthday_date property

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserEducationHistory
member.summary: Provides access to education history as the education property

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserEvents
member.summary: Provides access to the list of events the user is attending as the events connection

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserGroups
member.summary: Provides access to the list of groups the user is a member of as the groups connection

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserHomeTown
member.summary: Provides access to the user's hometown in the hometown property

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserInterests
member.summary: Provides access to the user's list of interests as the interests connection

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserLikes
member.summary: Provides access to the list of all of the pages the user has liked as the likes connection

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserLocation
member.summary: Provides access to the user's current location as the location property

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserNotes
member.summary: Provides access to the user's notes as the notes connection

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserOnlinePresence
member.summary: Provides access to the user's online/offline presence

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserPhotoVideoTags
member.summary: Provides access to the photos the user has been tagged in as the photos connection

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserPhotos
member.summary: Provides access to the photos the user has uploaded

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserRelationships
member.summary: Provides access to the user's family and personal relationships and relationship status

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserRelationshipDetails
member.summary: Provides access to the user's relationship preferences

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserReligionPolitics
member.summary: Provides access to the user's religious and political affiliations

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserStats
member.summary: Provides access to the user's most recent status message

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserVideos
member.summary: Provides access to the videos the user has uploaded

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserWebsite
member.summary: Provides access to the user's web site URL

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserWorkHistory
member.summary: Provides access to work history as the work property

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.Email
member.summary: Provides access to the user's primary email address in the email property. Do not spam users. Your use of email must comply both with Facebook policies and with the CAN-SPAM Act.

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.ReadFriendLists
member.summary: Provides read access to any friend lists the user created. NOTE: All user's friends are provided as part of basic data; this extended permission grants access to the lists of friends a user has created; and should only be requested if your application utilizes lists of friends.

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.ReadInsights
member.summary: Provides read access to the Insights data for pages; applications; and domains the user owns.

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.ReadMailbox
member.summary: Provides the ability to read from a user's Facebook Inbox.

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.ReadRequests
member.summary: Provides read access to the user's friend requests

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.ReadStream
member.summary: Provides access to all the posts in the user's News Feed and enables your application to perform searches against the user's News Feed

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.XmppLogin
member.summary: Provides applications that integrate with Facebook Chat the ability to log in users.

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.AdsManagement
member.summary: Provides the ability to manage ads and call the Facebook Ads API on behalf of a user.

member.name: F:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookPermissions.UserCheckins
member.summary: Provides read access to the authorized user's check-ins or a friend's check-ins that the user can see.

member.name: P:Brevitee.OAuth.FacebookIdentity.Id
member.summary: Maps to the source id (currently the Facebook id property)
